casebody.data:
CTY. OF CABARRUS, et al.
v.
TOLSON. No. 329P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. R. Daniel Boyce, Philip R. Isley, for County of Cabarrus et al. Grayson G. Kelly, Senior Deputy Attorney General, John F. Maddrey, Norma S. Harrell, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for the State.

*529The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of July 2004 by Plaintiffs To Deem Petition for Discretionary Review Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2004."
